data.message: This marks the second movie that is a straight rip off of Quinton Tarantino's Hateful 8 ... Yelawolf is a beast tho

replies.message: You understand this is a remake of an older movie right?
So was Tarantino's.. Just saying it's corny. Hollywood has no creativity once something sells (Tarantinos recent westerns) the rest of the industry jumps on the band wagon ... Wack
Hateful 8 was never a remake, the magnificent seven was an old movie from the 60s before they made a remake. Do your research before you start complaining about shit you don't know.
Plus these movies are completely different as far story line and characters. This will probably be 10 times better then Tarantino's Hateful 8 or Adam Sandler restarted ass movie Ridiculous 6

You're a moron .. The hateful 8 was heavily heavily influenced by the great silence as well as other classic westerns I called it a remake bc I didn't want to go into detail about this but apparently I have too so how about you do your research before you talk shit ... The point (which clearly you missed) was that bc of Tarantino's Hateful 8 is why westerns are a thing hence the point that Hollywood doesn't allow for creativity so shut the fuck up

See that's better than saying remake so technically you're still an idiot. There has also been plenty of westerns latley before Quinton Tarantino's so technically he wasn't the first to start the whole hype so sit down.
Right which western has done well in the box office before Hateful 8 again? Oh that's right Django
Also another remake but was before hateful eight and django
This movie has been in the planning stages for years its not like they saw hateful eight and were like hmm lets pop another western out 😂.
The PG 13 western was a classic?
True Grit is rated R, again do your research.

I for one love Tarantino's films. I like Django. Hateful eight was kind of a let down for me after all of his other great films like Jackie Brown, pull fiction, reservoir dogs etc. It didn't hit home. This film looks a lot more promising and has more of an actual western feel to it then hateful eight.
Do you even know the story line?
This is where this convo ends

Are you retarded? I'm talking about recently .. Studios aren't going to buy scripts and go into production on a script that they have no idea the public will like .. It's about money dip shit .. Like how there are tons of comic book movies coming out .. That's happening bc Hollywood knows that ppl will spend money n go watch them smh
